name: Field label item must have a translation into another language (PeopleSoft)
description:
Check the definition in the language.
Note that you can't specify a language in parameter but you can configure it at extraction time.
output: Failed checks give the number of fields that contain wrongly defined labels. The label name can be found in the value column
rationale: Multi-language is efficient only if all items have been translated. It decreases the risk of misunderstanding.
remediation: For multi-language, you must log-in to PeopleSoft using the correct language.
alternativeName: Field label item must have a translation into another language (PeopleSoft)
